payload.description:
Add `pb log` to visualize .pebbles/events.jsonl with optional git attribution.

Requirements:
- Newest-first (descending) ordering by event timestamp.
- Show event type, issue id, issue title, timestamp.
- Show actor when git context is available; otherwise show "unknown".
- Git integration must be optional and not required for basic log output.
- CLI should feel similar to `git log` (format/flags defined in subtask).
payload.title: Add pb log command

payload.description:

- Map event types to labels and how payload fields render (status_update, dep_add/dep_rm).
- Define actor fallback behavior when git metadata is unavailable.
payload.title: Spec pb log CLI + output format

payload.description:
Implement pb log core behavior.

Scope:
- Read .pebbles/events.jsonl and parse events.

- Format output with stable column widths/truncation.
- Handle unknown event types gracefully.
payload.title: Implement pb log event reader + formatter

payload.description:
Optional git integration for actor attribution.

Scope:
- When repo exists and .pebbles/events.jsonl is tracked, map each event line to git author + commit date (e.g., via `git blame --line-porcelain`).
- Cache blame results per run to avoid per-line calls.
- Add flag (e.g., --no-git) to skip git lookups.
- Fallback to "unknown" when git data is unavailable.
payload.title: Add git attribution to pb log
